Class Equipment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Equipment

  • public class Equipment
extends java.lang.Object
     Purpose
                
                The Equipment class holds a list of all the equipment a given character has equipped at
                any time. It also has methods to manage equipping, removing, and displaying the given
                equipped items (with an ASCII art drawing of a warrior).
                
 Structure / Process
                
                The Equipment class is instantiated as a part of the Player class. It's modified through
                the player class.
    See Also:
    Item, ItemDescription, Player, Inventory

      Constructors

    • Method Detail

      • equipItem

        public java.lang.String equipItem(Item oneItem)
        A method which equips the given item onto the player.
        Parameters:
        oneItem - A given item to equip onto a player
        Returns:
        A String which states the item was equipped (and if another was removed.

      • isEquipped

        public boolean isEquipped(Item oneItem)
        A method which tests whether an item is equipped or not.
        Parameters:
        oneItem - The given item to test to see if it is equipped.
        Returns:
        A true or false boolean value indicating whether the item is or is not equipped.

      • unequipItem

        public java.lang.String unequipItem(Item oneItem)
        A method which removes an item from a player's Equipment
        Parameters:
        oneItem - The given item to remove from equipment.
        Returns:
        Returns a String which indicates whether the item was successfully removed or not.

      • displayEquipment

        public java.lang.String displayEquipment()
        A method which displays all of the currently equipped gear.
        Returns:
        A String divided into two columns; the left column contains an ascii warrior wearing the given equipment while the right column contains a list of body locations and equipped items.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        A method which returns a String representing this Object.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A String with a listing of equipped items.

        Parameters:
        oneEquipment - The given Equipment Object to test for equality
        Returns:
        A true or false boolean value indicating equality or inequality.
